title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' option does not function as expected. After closing all editors, creating a new file f1.txt, and selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, nothing happens.
EB: After selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, all the opened files should be closed and the newly created file should also be closed.
SR:
1. Use build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Open multiple editors.
3. Create a new file f1.txt.
4. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
5. Verify that all the opened files, including the newly created file, are closed.
